includedAssets.title: Day 6: 6:00 A.M. - 7:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack is back as the 6th day of real-time drama 24 begins. Has Bauer escaped the clutches of the Chinese government?

includedAssets.synopsis: Jack offers the President crucial information, but he is no longer considered a credible source. Will Bauer go it alone?

includedAssets.title: Day 6: 8:00 A.M. - 9:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack has just one hour to work his magic before President Palmer is forced into setting a deadly precedent.

includedAssets.title: Day 6: 10:00 A.M. - 11:00 A.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Chloe follows a lead on a Russian arms dealer and is shocked when she uncovers a familiar name amongst a list of his regular contacts. But how will Jack take the news?
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Chloe follows a lead on a Russian arms dealer and is shocked when she uncovers a familiar name amongst a list of his regular contacts.

includedAssets.title: Day 6: 11:00 A.M. - 12:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: It's a family affair when Jack's father and brother become involved in the day's events. But can Jack trust his own flesh and blood as he moves in on the arms dealers?

includedAssets.title: Day 6: 12:00 P.M. - 1:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack attempts to get a lead on McCarthy by interrogating somebody close to him, but a startling confession threatens to unhinge the CTU man.

includedAssets.title: Day 6: 1:00 P.M. - 2:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Knowing it's only a matter of time before his hideout is compromised, Fayed employs brutal tactics to gain his hostage's co-operation. Will Jack be able to stop him?

includedAssets.title: Day 6: 2:00 P.M. - 3:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: The hunt for Fayed and Gredenko continues. But when disaster strikes for Jack, an unlikely hero might just do enough to keep CTU's hopes of locating them alive...

includedAssets.synopsis: As CTU's hunt for Gredenko intensifies, Phillip claims he has a contact who may help them find the Soviet general. But can Jack trust his father after what has happened?

includedAssets.synopsis: Jack continues his hunt for Gredenko as he races to stop another nuclear disaster.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Jack continues his hunt for Gredenko as he races to stop another nuclear disaster.

includedAssets.title: Day 6: 7:00 P.M. - 8:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Following the shocking events at the Russian Consulate, CTU tracks Gredenko and attempts to thwart further terror attacks on US soil.

includedAssets.title: Day 6: 8:00 P.M. - 9:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Terrorist masterminds Fayed and Gredenko discuss their plans to bring America to its knees once and for all, while Jack and Mike launch an intense field operation.

includedAssets.title: Day 6: 9:00 P.M. - 10:00 P.M.
includedAssets.synopsis: Jack uncovers vital intelligence from Gredenko, and CTU must act quickly if they are to capitalise on it. But things could be about to get a whole lot worse...

includedAssets.synopsis: Jack struggles to stave off the Russian attack on the US base in Asia. But is it too late for the CTU man to save his family, the world and get the girl? Last in series.

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: The U.S. Government work to bring Jack back from China in order to capture a terrorist mastermind. The stakes are high for Jack in this thrilling sixth season. Kiefer Sutherland stars.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The U.S. Government work to bring Jack (Kiefer Sutherland) back from China to find a terrorist mastermind. The stakes are high in this sixth season.

includedIn.synopsis: Jack Bauer, Director of Field Ops for the Counter-Terrorist Unit of Los Angeles, races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his nation from ultimate disaster.
